column1: Art Institute of Chicago////I went to Chicago in the Summer of 2012 to visit family
column2: and absolutely had the time of my life there. One of the highlights of the trip was my experience in the Millenium Park area
column3: where I spent a lot of time. At the behest of several family members
column4: I spent an extremely enjoyable day touring this gem by myself
column5: and really was sad when the day ended.
